metadata.title: CVE-2023-37536 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An integer overflow in xerces-c++ 3.2.3 in BigFix Platform allows remoteattackers to cause out-of-bound access via HTTP request.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-37536` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxerces-c-samples - 3.2.0+debian-2ubuntu0.1~esm3
libxerces-c3.2 - 3.2.0+debian-2ubuntu0.1~esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: xerces-c package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.2.0+debian-2ubuntu0.1~esm3').
